description.lang: S123xxxR.The Horstmann single phase S series smart programmable multi-rate meter provides simple, integrated and cost effective control of seasonal time of day (STOD) electricity tariffs and associated heating loads.Long life - 20 year certificationProgrammable up to 8 ratesIntegral load switching optionsHigh stability crystal clockLED consumption rate indicatorComplies with BSEN 62053 and BS 7856Optical communication interface compliant with BSEN 61107Eight tariff registers plus totaliser and reverse energy (export) registersFully programmable display configurationsMains syncronised internal clock (battery backed)Multi-rate weekday/weekend and seasonal tariff controlProgram random offset and soft start capabilityAll features programmable via standard IEX/FLAG opto port.
